PHRASE.LANG: kName

Captain's Whistler Jacket (Male)
kDesc
Wear this jacket while playing Cutthroats and gain unlimited whistler balls! [#Legal]
Portez cette veste en jouant à Cutthroats et vous gagnerez des boulets pour canon siffleur en illimité ! [#Legal]
Wer diese Jacke beim Spielen von "Halsabschneider" trägt, erhält unbegrenzte Pfeiferkugeln! [#Legal]
Indossa questa giacca quando giochi a Tagliagole e otterrai palle sibilanti infinite! [#Legal]
¡Si juegas a Degolladores con esta casaca puesta, ganas balas silbadoras ilimitadas! [#Legal]
무법자를 플레이하며 이 자켓을 입고 휘파람 포탄을 무한정 사용하세요! [#Legal]
Wear this jacket while playing Cutthroats and gain unlimited whistler balls! [#Legal]
穿上此夾克便可擁有無限的哨子炮彈！ [#Legal]
穿上此夾克便可擁有無限的哨子炮彈！ [#Legal]
Wear this jacket while playing Cutthroats and gain unlimited whistler balls! [#Legal]
